metadata.title: CVE-2019-18610 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in manager.c in Sangoma Asterisk through 13.x,16.x, 17.x and Certified Asterisk 13.21 through 13.21-cert4. A remoteauthenticated Asterisk Manager Interface (AMI) user without systemauthorization could use a specially crafted Originate AMI request toexecute arbitrary system commands.

criterions.comment: asterisk package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
